profile:
Kleiner Moving & Storage are locally owned and operated moving and storage company who strive to give clients a stress-free experience. Every project is different and we work towards a customized solution for each individual or family or company. Sit down, relax, and let our movers do the heavy lifting. With our all-in-one pricing and services, our goal is to help you make a smooth transition into your new home or office. Get your free estimate with us today! We have experience with both residential and commercial properties in Greater Vancouver, Fraser Valley, and Vancouver Island.  We also move clients to the Interior too.

All our rates include a minimum of 2 men, a truck, gas, and mileage.  There are no hidden fees and our hourly fee is 100% guaranteed with a written quote.  Whether it is a piano or packing whatever you require our team will be equipped to do it. We bill by the hour with a 2 hour minimum with 1 hour travel time, which covers 30 mins to the site and 30 mins back to the site.  Example: Final Invoice will be hours worked from start to finish plus 1 hour travel time.

Here is our promise!
- Customer Services is our first priority!  We listen to our clients and always come up with creative alternative solutions for every situation.  
- We have no hidden fees!  At Kleiner Services , we always send an estimate before the job for our clients to review.  
- We show up on time and work on your budget!  We keep our clients informed during the entire job.
- We don't charge extra for curb side items, long narrow walkways, or stairs.  We work the job until it is done!
- We focus on following up with our customers to ensure our clients are happy even after the move.
products: We offer all products required for moving services such as shrink wrap, moving pads, tap, boxes, bubble wrap and more.  Just call us and ask.
services:
We offer Pre and Post Moving Services. That includes, packing with an inventory report, assembly and disassembly,storage, and if you require delivery services and junk removal depending on the items. 

We also offer content management for restoration companies if you have been in a fire or flood.
brands:
Kleiner Services Inc. is a family BC owned company.  We treat you like our family which makes you our priority.  We focus on customer services and put your needs and your prized possessions on top of the list.  

We train and treat our movers and packers like family.  Therefore, they treat you like family.
specialities:
Our specialties is listening to our clients and paying attention to details. 

We also move pianos and deal with content management.
payment_method: Cash, Visa, Master Card, Cheque, and eTransfers
